lead_paragraph: Quarterback Cam Newton was not the only Carolina Panthers player performing like Superman on Sunday as the brilliant pass-and-run threat teamed up with his mates to soar into the Super Bowl.

headline.print_headline: 'Superman' Newton and Team Mates Soar Into Super Bowl
headline.main: 'Superman' Newton and Team Mates Soar Into Super Bowl
